overview: Nazi propaganda film about the "Theresienstadt ghetto". The film was supposed to show the world that Jews didn't suffer in concentration camps. Upon completion, most Jews shown in the film (including director Kurt Gerron) were brought to Auschwitz, where they were killed.

production_companies.name: Zentralamt zur Regelung der Judenfrage in Böhmen und Mähren

title: Theresienstadt
